text: The Panther Clipper Mk II is a freighter manufactured by Zorgon Peterson, produced from 3311 to the present. It is the first large SCO-optimized ship in Elite Dangerous, featuring a maximum cargo capacity of 1238 tons. The ship was first revealed in the Frontier Unlocked livestream on April 30, 2025, with its specs and early access date confirmed on June 25, 2025. Its predecessor, the Panther Clipper, appeared in Frontier: Elite II as the largest and slowest ship, capable of planetary bombardment and resistant to small pirate attacks.

The Panther Clipper Mk II has a landing pad size of Large, accommodates 4 pilot seats, supports multicrew, and includes a fighter hangar. It features 1x Class 1, 1x Class 2, 1x Class 4, 2x Class 5, 3x Class 6, 2x Class 7, and 2x Class 8 internal compartments.

The Panther Clipper Mk II's default outfitting includes four small hardpoints with a max class of 1, four medium hardpoints with a max class of 2, and two large hardpoints with a max class of 3. It also has four utility mounts, a bulkhead with Lightweight Alloys (Grade I), a reactor bay with a max class of 8, thrusters mounting with a max class of 8, a frame shift drive housing with a max class of 7, an environment control with a max class of 5, a power coupling with a max class of 7, a sensor suite with a max class of 5, a fuel store with a max class of 7, and various internal compartments with max classes ranging from 1 to 8.
